title: How do I transfer an ancient app from my Samsung to my new Pixel?
content: I have a very old app on my Samsung that I use frequently and find very valuable, but it is no longer available on the Play Store and didn't transfer over when setting up my new Pixel. Is there any other way to move it over? I really don't want to lose the data in it.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
